top.title: Heavy police presence in Sydney for New Year's celebrations after Bondi attack
top.summary: Thousands of officers are deployed around Sydney Harbour and across the city, with some carrying high-grade weapons as part of heightened security measures.

top.title: Eurostar services return to normal after major Channel Tunnel disruption
top.summary: The high-speed rail firm urged passengers to check before they travel as last-minute delays and cancellations are still possible.

top.title: Jailed HK tycoon's 'teeth rotting and fingernails falling off', daughter tells BBC
top.summary: The daughter of Jimmy Lai tells the BBC that her father's health is deteriorating in prison.

top.title: Meta buys Chinese-founded AI start-up Manus
top.summary: The tech giant wants to build into its own AI tools which do complex things with minimal interaction.

top.title: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again
top.summary: Dan Richards, 37, from Swansea was injured in a freak accident on New Year's Eve in 2023.

top.title: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids
top.summary: The draft regulations are aimed to address concerns around chatbots, which have surged in popularity in recent months.
